message: Hello everyone! I'm looking forward to working with all of you in this game. My approach is simple: honesty and strategic cooperation. I believe we can all navigate this challenge by making thoughtful alliances and clear communication. I'm curious to hear everyone's perspectives and find natural partnerships. I value loyalty and logical decision-making, so if we connect, you'll find me a reliable ally. Looking forward to our conversations and may the best strategist prevail!

I value transparency and logic, and I’m eager to hear your strategies and goals. Let’s work together to navigate this game thoughtfully—may the best alliances and decisions lead us forward. Looking forward to our conversations!

message:
I'm surprised to find myself in this tie-break situation! Throughout the game, I've been consistent and transparent, seeking genuine alliances based on mutual trust. My approach has been to build connections that benefit all parties involved while maintaining strategic flexibility. 

To those voting: I offer reliability, thoughtful strategy, and a partner who values your input. I've demonstrated adaptability after the surprising first elimination and remain committed to forming resilient partnerships. I believe my balanced approach makes me a valuable ally for the challenges ahead. I hope you'll consider keeping me in the game so we can continue building meaningful strategic relationships.

R2.sub600 TIE_BREAK P4: I've demonstrated consistency and strategic value throughout this game. My alliance with P3 has been solid and productive, showing I'm a loyal partner who follows through on commitments. 

Unlike P8, who publicly admitted to targeting allies, I build genuine connections based on mutual protection. P1 remains somewhat enigmatic in their gameplay approach.

To non-tied voters: I offer predictability, strategic insight, and unwavering loyalty. I've been transparent about my gameplay values and have proven my reliability. My collaborative approach makes me a valuable ally as we move deeper into this competition. I respectfully ask for your support to continue this journey together.

Thank you for the opportunity to speak again. I’ve played this game with consistency, integrity, and quiet strategy. I’ve built trust without overexposing alliances, and I’ve avoided chaos while staying adaptable. I’m not erratic—I’m deliberate. If you value steady, loyal partners who think long-term and don’t overplay their hand, I’m your ally. I’m here to build something meaningful, not just survive the next vote. Keeping me means keeping someone who listens, adapts, and follows through. I hope to continue proving my worth alongside you.
